oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Special requisition No. 40 for clothing
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Capt. Robert H. Clinton, Co. F, 1st Mid. Tenn. (later 10th Tenn.) Inf., USA, received this special requisition of clothing for recruits at Camp Spears, Nashville, Tenn. The requisition included trousers, stockings, drawers, shoes, shirts, blouses, caps and dress coats. Clinton enrolled on June 5, 1862 in the 1st Regt. Middle Tenn. Inf., USA, under Col. Alvan Cullem Gillem of Jackson County and mustered out June 20, 1865 in Knoxville, Tenn.
